Review Text: Mercure Bandung Nexa Supratman is a well-positioned near Supratman Road, right in the center of Bandung City. Its location is convenient and easily accessible by public and local transport, making it suitable for both business. With its layout and services, the hotel clearly caters to a MICE-oriented clientele. The ambience is modern and professional. Rooms are clean, well kept, and designed with contemporary comfort in mind, providing a pleasant and functional stay without unnecessary excess. Facilities are well rounded. Breakfast is served buffet-style and offers a fairly complete selection, including halal options. While satisfactory, it does not particularly stand out in terms of variety or uniqueness. Staff members are friendly, polite, and helpful, contributing positively to the overall experience. Overall, Mercure Bandung Nexa Supratman is a comfortable choice, especially for business travelers or events. While it may not feel exceptional, it delivers consistent quality, good service, and a strategic location.

I stayed over the weekend and had the hotel breakfast, and overall it was a very pleasant surprise. Even though it was moderately crowded, the variety and quality of the food really stood out. The highlights for me were definitely the snacks, super delicious! The gorengan was super crispy, the crepes were lovely, and the yogurt tasted wonderfully natural, almost like it was made in-house with no artificial sweeteners or flavors. For the main dishes, the Indonesian selections were abundant and tasted great. You can tell the ingredients they use are high-quality. The only thing I didnâ€™t enjoy was the Italian section. I tried the pasta aglio olio, but it was too salty for my taste and it wasnâ€™t mixed evenly. Some bites were overly salty while others were quite bland. What truly sets this breakfast apart from many other hotel restaurants is the exceptional service. Waiter Teguh Wijaya and Executive Chef Yana went above and beyond. I asked where the yogurt was (it was there; I just missed it), and instead of simply pointing me in the right direction, they hand-delivered it to my table and even checked if there was anything else I needed. It felt like fine-dining level service, truly something I didnâ€™t expect from a hotel breakfast :) Overall, a great experience with standout service, crispy snacks, and plenty of delicious options. Would happily return!

Saya menginap di hotel ini dan secara keseluruhan mendapat pengalaman yang cukup baik dengan beberapa catatan. Kamar yang saya tempati terasa nyaman dan terawat, walaupun furniturnya sudah terlihat agak tua. Lokasi hotel sangat strategis, dekat dengan banyak pilihan kuliner khas Bandung serta berbagai destinasi wisata, sehingga sangat memudahkan tamu yang ingin berkeliling kota. Sebagai anggota Platinum, saya sangat mengapresiasi upgrade dua tingkat ke kamar yang lebih luas. Fasilitas tambahan di area lobby seperti meja biliar dan permainan juga menjadi nilai lebih yang membuat suasana hotel lebih hidup dan ramah untuk keluarga. Namun, ada beberapa hal yang menurut saya masih perlu ditingkatkan. Saat proses check-in, pelayanan resepsionis terasa kurang hangat dibandingkan standar pelayanan yang biasa saya temui di jaringan Mercure. Selain itu, pengalaman sarapan agak mengecewakan. Pada pukul 7 pagi, cukup banyak menu yang belum tersedia, dan kualitas hidangan secara keseluruhan terasa di bawah standar yang biasanya diharapkan dari brand ini. Secara umum, hotel ini menawarkan lokasi strategis dan kamar yang cukup nyaman, terutama dengan benefit bagi member loyalitas. Hanya saja, peningkatan di sisi pelayanan resepsionis dan kualitas sarapan akan membuat pengalaman menginap jauh lebih memuaskan.

I stayed for one night in this hotel for a business meeting. Checking in, I was greeted by a not so big but a welcoming lobby. It was a seamless check in, and I went up to my room. At the third floor, I was greeted by a wide and neatly designed hallway. Entering my room, I was welcomed by a compact but comforting room, including a soft bed, a big smart tv and a cold AC with a reliable internet connection. The bathroom, however, had a lack of amenities. No hand and doormat towels, as well as no hand soap. It seemed the hotel tried to save money for something small but important for the guests. Without a doormat towel, the bathroom could get slippery at times. The bathroom was definitely the area for improvement. Going down the next morning, I first went to the gym and found limited equipments, yet there were treadmills that I could use for an exercise. My next stop was the restaurant for breakfast. I found sufficient choices for foods with a not so enticing taste. The food quality was another area for improvement. Going back up, I took a bath and went back down for checking out. I experience a seamless checking out process. Despite two areas for improvement, I enjoy my stay at this premise.

As a Gold Accor member, I expected certain benefits when booking through the official website. However, I experienced a lack of advantages during my recent stay at this property in Bandung. Firstly, despite having my credit card information readily available on my reservation, the hotel requested a bank transfer as payment to secure my room as I will do check-in at 8pm. This unexpected requirement caused inconvenience and raised concerns about the security of my reservation. Secondly, the hotel itself fell short of my expectations for a four-star property. While the rooms were adequate, they lacked the special touches I'd anticipate at this level. The towels are used, although they do not appear as white as I had expected before. Additionally, the chair seat has holes. Further, it is advisable to avoid room 715, as it is subject to street noise. The pool was particularly underwhelming, being more suitable for children than for serious swimming. The WiFi connection is also poor. Although, the staff were friendly and provided decent service, but nothing exceptional. Overall, I recommend staying at this hotel for a maximum of two nights. While it may suffice for a short trip, it's unlikely to exceed expectations for discerning travelers or those seeking a luxurious experience.

The hotel room itself was decent: soundproof, comfortable, and fairly clean. However, there were a few small pieces of trash left behind, such as an empty inhaler wrapper from the previous guest, which seemed to have been overlooked during cleaning. The check-in process took significantly longer than at other hotels Iâ€™ve stayed at in Bandung. I waited for around 30 minutes. Upon check-in, I was assigned a â€œflexibleâ€ room that allowed smoking, even though I had clearly booked a non-smoking room from the beginning. I was informed that if I wanted a non-smoking room, I would need to wait an additional 15â€“20 minutes for it to be cleaned, despite it already being 3:00 PM. Breakfast was quite limited for a four-star hotel. The fruit selection was kept behind a display, with only three varieties available, and each request was served in very small portions. While it was possible to ask for more, this felt unusual, as most hotels allow guests to take fruit freely. Saat check in, trnyata sudah dipakai tamu lain. Begitu saya pesan 1 kamar tambahan dan sudah bayar, resepsionis bilang extra bed dari tamu lain dicancel. Saya ditawari apa akan tetap pkai extra bed. Ya ampun,, ini hotel bintang 4 kan?? - area restoran kurang luas. para tamu dibatasi makan hanya 1 jam. Seumur hidup baru kali ini ada hotel yg membatasi waktu makan tamu hotelny. - keset toilet tidak tersedia di salah satu kamar yg saya pesan.seumur hidup baru kali ini saya pengalaman hotel di atas bintang 3 sampai lupa menyediakan keset toilet. - hair dryer di salah satu kamar yg saya pesan tiba2 mati dan tidak berfungsi. Akhirny saya gunakan hair dryer di kamar satunya. Mohon dicheck berkala untuk pihak hotel. - tempat sampah kamar tidak diberi plastik tambahan. - lampu tidur di samping kasur, di salah satu kamar yg saya pesan, tidak menyala kembali di pagi hari. Stelah malam hariny dimatikan saat tidur. - saya pesan 2 kamar (dapat di lantai 5 dan 8). Agak ksulitan jika saya dari lantai 8 ke lantai 5. Dan sebaliknya jika saudara dari lantai 5 ke lantai 8. Kartu kamar hanya bisa untuk lantai basement, loby, dan kamar tempat menginap (lantai 5 saja atau 8 saja). Jadi harus janjian di depan lift kalau saya di lantai 8 mau turun ke lantai 5. Ini cukup lucu untuk sekelas hotel bintang 4. Mohon bisa dipikirkan kembali untuk pihak hotel. Nilai plus: + diberikan voucher makan 100.000 (mungkin sbg kompensasi krna tdk dapat extra bed) + diberikan voucher pijat refleksi 45 menit (mungkin sbg kompensasi krna tdk dapat extra bed) + kamar dan kasur bersih + ada sofa (untuk kamar delux) dan kamar agak luas dibanding kamar superior. Walaupun tidak terlalu berefek banyak thd kenyamanan. + ada dispenser untuk refill air botol di setiap laintai dekat lift + makanan beragam. Nasi goreng, bubur, soto, puding, jus, dll. Ada jg mi instan. Saya usul ada makanan tradisional /khas bandung jg. Sperti hotel metland di cirebon yg mnyediakan menu tahu gejrot di menu sarapannya. Banyak hal yg perlu diperbaiki dan ditingkatkan. Tidak hanya merespon review di google maps dari para tamu hotel saja, tapi jg tindakan nyata akan memperbaiki dan meningkatkan hal yg disorot. Ruangan terasa gelap, terutama area meja. Bagaimana kalau ada yang perlu bekerja? Di sebelahnya memang ada standing lamp, tapi menurut saya tidak cukup. 2. Masih berhubungan dengan poin 1. Masih soal restoran. Area outdoornya tepat bersebelahan dengan kolam renang. Sialnya, orang Indonesia selalu merokok begitu melihat area terbuka.
